human: What was shown in this diagram?

gpt:
This diagram shows a two-story floor plan for a residential unit. 

On the lower level, there is a living area connected to a dining space. Next to the dining area is a dry kitchen, which is adjacent to an Asian kitchen, presumably designed for high-heat cooking or possibly with equipment and layout catering to Asian cuisine. There is also a yard area next to the Asian kitchen, which includes a water closet (WC) and a space labeled "WD," which might refer to a washing machine or washer/dryer setup. Additionally, there is Bedroom 3 and an associated Bath 3. The lower level also includes a storeroom or household shelter (HS), a balcony accessible through the living area, and a staircase leading to the upper level.

On the upper level, there is a master bedroom suite with a walk-in wardrobe and an attached master bath. There's also Bedroom 2, which has access to Bath 2. The upper level shows a void area, indicating an opening to the living/dining area below, and an AC (air conditioning) ledge on the exterior part of the building.

The floor plan indicates a lift, suggesting that this unit is part of a multi-story building. The layout is quite modern, with an emphasis on open spaces and comfort, as indicated by the inclusion of en suite bathrooms and specialized kitchen spaces.
